entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 26
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo from the special event 197x-0000 Official Visit of Sir C.P. has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 197x.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
